content: General Investments Regular Shares Savings Plans (RSS) Asked by Lucas NeoAsked on 05 Apr 2019Will shares bought through RSS be under my own CDP account, or held by the bank as a custodial?1 answerAnswerBump1

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 05 Apr 2019Hi Lucas. It'll be held in custodian until you transfer to cdp (with applicable fees)0 comments1
